data.Sentence_cn: 布赖恩，你正在下足球赛的赌注吗？
data.Sentence: Are you doing the football pools, Brain?

data.Sentence_cn: 是的。我这就做完了，朱莉。
我敢肯定这星期我们会赢一点的。
data.Sentence: I'm sure we'll win something this week.

data.Sentence_cn: 你老是那样说，但是我们从来没赢过！
data.Sentence: You always say that, but we never win anything!

data.Sentence_cn: 要是你赢了许多钱，你打算做什么呢？
data.Sentence: What will you do if you win a lot of money?

data.Sentence_cn: 要是我赢了许多钱，我给你买件貂皮大衣。
data.Sentence: If I win a lot of money I'll buy you a mink coat!
I don't want a mink coat!
I want to see the world.

data.Sentence_cn: 好吧。要是我们赢了很多钱，
data.Sentence: All right. If we win a lot of money,

data.Sentence_cn: 我们就去周游世界，并且住最好的旅馆。
data.Sentence: we'll travel round the world and we'll stay at the best hotels.

data.Sentence_cn: 然后我们返回家园，在乡下买幢大房子。
data.Sentence: Then we'll return home and buy a big house in the country.

data.Sentence_cn: 我们将有一个漂亮的花园和……
data.Sentence: We'll have a beautiful garden and ...

data.Sentence_cn: 但是如果我们把所有钱都花光了，我们又会变穷的。
data.Sentence: But if we spend all that money we'll be poor again.

data.Sentence_cn: 如果我们花光了所有钱，我们设法在足球赛赌注上再赢一次。
data.Sentence: If we spend all the money,we'll try and win the football pools again.

data.Sentence_cn: 这是个美好的梦，但一切都取决于“如果”！
data.Sentence: It's a pleasant dream but everything depends on 'if'!
